common_errors.cause: Cannot read namespace information for other users' processes
common_errors.solution: Use sudo: sudo lsns. Root can see all namespaces.

common_errors.cause: Namespace filesystem not available or process ended
common_errors.solution: Process may have terminated. Check /proc/PID exists. Kernel may lack namespace support.
Valid types: mnt, net, uts, ipc, user, pid, cgroup, time. Check kernel support.
Verify process exists: ps -p PID. Process may have terminated.
Ensure /proc is mounted. Check kernel has procfs support.

common_errors.cause: Cannot access namespace of process (process may be zombied)
common_errors.solution: Process may be in zombie state. Check process status with ps.
List columns: lsns --help. Common: NS, TYPE, NPROCS, PID, USER, COMMAND
Namespace may have been destroyed. Use lsns without filter to list available.

common_errors.cause: Kernel lacks support for requested namespace type
common_errors.solution: Namespace type may require newer kernel. Check kernel config.
